definitions.definition: A small sac , pouch , or cyst .

The smaller of the two fluid -filled sacs forming part of the labyrinth of the inner ear (the other being the utricle ). It contains a region of hair cells and otoliths which send signals to the brain concerning the orientation of the head.

main_definition: ( biology , anatomy ) A small sac , pouch , or cyst .
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy ) The smaller of the two fluid -filled sacs forming part of the labyrinth of the inner ear (the other being the utricle ). It contains a region of hair cells and otoliths which send signals to the brain concerning the orientation of the head.
